name: Ski Challenge 2010
summary: Ski Challenge 2010 is the 6th edition of the alpine skiing series Ski Challenge. The game includes the famous alpine downhill tracks of Bormio, Val Gardena, Kitzbühel, Wengen, Val-d’Isère, Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Beaver Creek and Whistler Mountain. The goal for the players is to climb the leaderboards by getting the fastest times. Three day events were held on each track to determine race winners who would win physical prizes.
